results.title: Vitamin D status determines the impact of metformin on circulating prolactin levels in premenopausal women.
results.text_hl: The drug produced a neutral effect on circulating levels of thyrotropin, free thyroid hormones, gonadotropins, @CHEMICAL_Estradiol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004958 @@@estradiol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ and @CHEMICAL_25_hydroxyvitamin_D @CHEMICAL_MESH:C104450 @@@25-hydroxyvitamin D.@@@ WHAT IS NEW AND THE CONCLUSION: The results of the current study suggest that the impact of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on secretory function of @<m>DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Overactive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D053201 @@@overactive lactotropes@@@ depends on the @CHEMICAL_Vitamin_D @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014807 @@@vitamin D@@@ status of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Krysiak R, Kowalcze K, Okopień B. Vitamin D status determines the impact of metformin on circulating prolactin levels in premenopausal women. J Clin Pharm Ther. 2021 Oct;46(5):1349-1356. PMID: 34076286
citations.BibTeX: @article{34076286, title={Vitamin D status determines the impact of metformin on circulating prolactin levels in premenopausal women.}, author={Krysiak R and Kowalcze K and Okopień B}, journal={J Clin Pharm Ther}, volume={46}, number={5}, pages={1349-1356}}

results.title: The Impact of Ethinyl Estradiol on Metformin Action on Prolactin Levels in Women with Hyperprolactinemia.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: The obtained results suggest that the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Overactive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D053201 @@@overactive lactotropes@@@ depends on estrogen levels.

citations.NLM: Krysiak R, Szkróbka W, Okopień B. The Impact of Ethinyl Estradiol on Metformin Action on Prolactin Levels in Women with Hyperprolactinemia. Exp Clin Endocrinol Diabetes. 2021 Jan;129(1):22-28. PMID: 31234219
